translations.Use Nextcloud as an SCIM identity provid: Tumia Nextcloud kama mtoa utambulisho wa SCIM
translations.Use Nextcloud as an identity provider fo:
Tumia Nextcloud kama mtoa huduma za kitambulisho kwa huduma za nje kwa kutumia kiwango cha [SCIM](https://scim.cloud/).

Ongeza tu seva zako za SCIM katika mipangilio ya msimamizi, na programu itasawazisha kiotomatiki watumiaji na vikundi vyote vya Nextcloud kwenye seva zako.
Tumia Nextcloud kama mtoa huduma za kitambulisho kwa huduma za nje kwa kutumia kiwango cha SCIM.
translations.Are you sure you want to delete this ser: Je, una uhakika unataka kufuta seva hii?
translations.A server with this name already exists: Seva yenye jina hili tayari ipo
translations.URL should start with http:// or https:/: URL inapaswa kuanza na http:// au https://
translations.A server with this URL already exists: Seva yenye URL hii tayari ipo
translations.Failed to connect to server. Check the l: Imeshindwa kuunganisha kwenye seva. Angalia kumbukumbu
translations.Failed to check connection to server. Ch: Imeshindwa kuangalia muunganisho kwa seva. Angalia kumbukumbu
translations.Server successfully registered, initial: Seva imesajiliwa kwa mafanikio, usawazishaji wa awali umeanza
translations.Name: Jina
translations.Register a new server below and fill in: Sajili seva mpya hapa chini na jaza maelezo yanayohitajika
translations.Sync request successful. This may take a: Ombi la usawazishaji limefanikiwa. Hii inaweza kuchukua muda
translations.Sync request failed. Check the logs: Ombi la usawazishaji limeshindwa. Angalia kumbukumbu
